channel.title: Error Connecting to the server
channel.description: Ok so i start up my server, then i try to log in with my correct ip. It says error connecting to the server. i try again, same thing. i have the right port in, so what should i do? thanks.

item.title: Error Connecting to the server
item.dc:creator: @mata20000 mata20000
item.description:
@mata20000 wrote:

well u dont need correct ip if its ur own server just runserver

make name and pass and leave the ip as 127.0.0.1

check the port in the black box. if it isnt 43594 u need to change it

Read full topic
